description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the privilege escalation issue arising from CVE-2024-9956 in the Chromium implementation used by Microsoft Edge:

1. Update Microsoft Edge to the latest version, specifically version 130.0.6723.59 or later.
2. Confirm that the update has been successfully applied by navigating within Microsoft Edge to the menu (three dots) > Help and feedback > About Microsoft Edge.

**Details**:
- This update addresses critically important vulnerabilities within the web authentication mechanism.
- For Microsoft Edge users, this is essential to ensure the browser is secure against local attacks leveraging crafted HTML pages.
- Follow the version update instructions to check and ensure your Edge browser runs on the updated version. (LLM Synthesized)

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure you are not running an outdated version of Microsoft Edge.
- Backup any important data as a precaution before updating.
